scripts.postinstall: for dir in services/*; do (cd "$dir" && npm install); done
scripts.test: for dir in services/*; do (cd "$dir" && npm test); done
scripts.build: for dir in services/*; do (cd "$dir" && npm build); done
scripts.deploy: for dir in services/*; do (cd "$dir" && npm deploy); done
scripts.release: for dir in services/*; do (cd "$dir" && npm release); done
